=======
CHANGES
=======

1.0.1 (2009-12-16)
------------------

- Feature: Add a test for getting the file list within a sub-directory of the
  repository.

- Bug: It turns out that setuptools does not like "./<path>" notation but only
  "<path>". Fixed the problem.


1.0.0 (2009-12-15)
------------------

- Initial release.
